scripts.buildWasmDebug:nix: cd wasm-scripts && bash make-build-wasm2d.sh debug && bash make-build-wasm3d.sh debug
scripts.buildWasmDebug:windows: cd wasm-scripts && make-build-wasm2d.bat debug && make-build-wasm3d.bat debug
scripts.buildJs: rimraf lib/* && npm run generateGlobalExportsModule && tsc
scripts.buildBrowserBundle: cd SciChartBrowserBundle && npm install && npm run generateExportsFile && npm run build
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.installAll: npm install && cd SciChartBrowserBundle && npm install && cd .. && cd SciChartDemo && npm install
scripts.buildWasm: npm run buildWasm2d && npm run buildWasm3d
scripts.buildWasm:nix: npm run buildWasm2d:nix && npm run buildWasm3d:nix
scripts.buildWasmTest: npm run buildWasm2dTest && npm run buildWasm3dTest
scripts.buildWasmTest:nix: npm run buildWasm2dTest:nix && npm run buildWasm3dTest:nix
scripts.build: npm run buildWasm && npm run buildWasmTest && npm run buildJs && npm run buildBrowserBundle && npm run updateJson && npm run copyToLib
scripts.build:nix: npm run buildWasm:nix && npm run buildWasmTest:nix && npm run buildJs && npm run buildBrowserBundle && npm run updateJson && npm run copyToLib
scripts.publishPrivate: cd lib && npmrc private && npm publish
scripts.publishPrivateAlpha: cd lib && npmrc private && npm publish --tag alpha
scripts.publishPrivateBeta: cd lib && npmrc private && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.publishPublic: cd lib && npmrc public && npm publish
scripts.publishPublicAlpha: cd lib && npmrc public && npm publish --tag alpha
scripts.publishPublicBeta: cd lib && npmrc public && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.prepare: cd .. && cd .. && cd .. && husky install Web/src/SciChart/.husky
